archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: Manage Frontend Application Status
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
Ability to define the following frontend application statuses: - Level 1: Successful or Unsuccessful - Level 2: Pre-qualification, Testing, Interview, Reference Check, Job Offer, Hired
Abilty to identify the Level 2 status associated with a Level 1 status (e.g. Unsuccessful - Completed Testing) - Applicant cannot be Unsuccessful and Hired
